She wanted to see more, she wanted to see Marie eat until Marie was as big as she was. She wanted to see Marie to fat to move, hell she wanted to see everyone turned into a big blob of fat. Gillian panted heavily from the thought of everyone getting fat. Marie's pokemon didn't seem to mind to much, it meant they were being fed even if it was getting everywhere.

"Marie keep eating" Gillian said suddenly her eyes wide with anticipation.

But if it means making a mess like you I could be for it... plus I wouldn't have to do anything all day if I'm a fat ass like you.... oh and think of how much of a mess I'll have on me if I'm to lazy to move..." Marie said fantasizing about being covered in crumbs and food as she ground a jelly donut into her shirt making the grease and jelly grind into the fabric staining it forever. "What do you mean?" Gillian said with 3 hot dogs hanging out of her mouth "I'm on the verge of a orgasm this food is so good and so fattening, how could I enjoy it more?" Gillian asked shoving the hot dogs all the way into her mouth by cramming 3 more behind them.

"I mean like I am" Marie explained gesturing to her food smeared face and torso. "It's so much better if you just eat like you were at first with no care for how much of a mess you made and and..." Marie tried to explain but let out a burp insteed.

Deep in the city Mew moved slowly through an ally. She was exhausted and without her power to lift herself psychically she was walking, an activity she had decided she thoughly hated about 6 times in the last hour. Mew crept around the corner of a dirty building trying to use her psychic powers to sense Mewtwo and what he was up to but it was no use, all she got was a dull buzzing sound in her head. Mew's head ached slightly from the exertion. Mew decided to take a break again feeling very tired despite how little she had really done. Mew hopped onto a tipped over trash can and soon nodded off.

As Mew dozed she started having dreams, she was surrounded by food and it kept begging it to eat her. All around her shapeless forms carried food to her side and offered it up for her to consume. Mew refused at first but the smell of it, it was driving her mad. Again and again the forms came at her with food and requests to feed her as she lay back and enjoyed it but she resisted, denying them each time, yet each time her protests grew weaker and weaker. At last she broke, the smell, the texture, the sheer sight of all that delicious food, she couldn't stand it any longer, She opened her mouth and al her "subjects" as she was beginning to view them, loomed over her and pushed all their food at her in one big push.

Mew stirred rolling over on her seat and falling off the dirty metal can. Mew blinked regaining her bearing. The last thing she had seen was thousands of faithful subjects giving her... giving, what? Mew swung her head back and forth a bit shaking the mental cobwebs loose, a new feeling for her to have her mind anything less than omnipotent. Mew's mind was playing tricks on her, deep in her she felt an urge... a desire... a hunger... a hunger for what? Power? That wasn't like her. But it was undeniable in her subconscious something yearned for more and it was having free reign in her mind as long as her psychic powers were unavailable. Mew's stomach tied itself in a knot with worry over what Mewtwo had done to her while she was unconscious, Mew was also coming to terms with this new emotion know as fear...

Suddenly Mew caught whiff of something, something delicious. The fear of what lurked in her mind dissolved when the opportunity of food presented itself, Had Mew realized this her fear would had doubled, but instead she was to busy trying to sniffout which way it was coming from. Peering around the corner the backally door of a restaurant hung open. Inside a clash of kitchenware rang in the ally as chefs worked like madmen to satisfy their new food obsessed customers. Mew race across the ally and ducked behind a dumpster. As she neared she could hear the calls from inside of many different chefs.

"Get some more pasta out there they can't get enough of it!"
"I can't find the measuring cup for the cheese!"
"It doesn't matter just dump it all on they seem to want as much of it as they can get"
"I can't find the meat I was frying up for sloppy joes!"
"It's out there already!"
"without the buns?!"
"They don't care they're eating it with their hands, hell they're eating everything!"
"I know I got mobbed last time I took a platter out! Now one is waiting at tables anymore they just grab it as soon as we finish!"
"geez-us you think that weird broadcast earlier about all of us turning into freaks was for real?!"
"Quit the chatter guys if I don't get another tray of food out there soon they'll bust in here and take it!"
"How are we even keeping track of their tabs, Who the hell is paying for all this food!?"
"I dunno where's the boss??"
"He's out there in the mob eating like everyone else, don't bother all he keeps saying is 'more food more food!'"'
"Guys! They're coming in!"
"Hey you greedy Bas- ARGHH"

A clatter of pots and pans rang out as a rack of cookware toppled over, a horde of customers pushed their way past the doors two bus boys were trying to barricade with their arms and ran over top of them assaulting the chefs. A fight broke out as the slob masses tried to push the cooks aside and eat the food in storage while the chefs tried to hold onto the fading notion that they commanded this kitchen.

Mew took her opportunity and slipped into the fray. Dodging feet and running through the argument she crept into the pantry and her eyes lit up. Though half empty there was still many things left, to her delight the racks of pastries made that morning hadn't been reduced to badly by the crowd of slobs and a few trays of cupcakes remained as well as half a rack of donuts and 1/3 a rack of marble fudge. Mew climbed onto the shelf beside her and flipped the latch on the door to keep the horde of barbarians out while she dinned. Mew leapt onto the tray of fudge and sat herself down to begin shoving it in. Mew was delighted to finally have something to eat, she was beginning to feel so hungry she felt like she hadn't eaten in weeks. Now she was making up for what felt like lost time. Mew sat with her legs spread leaning forward over the fudge clawing at it and raking it into her mouth, her butt seated on the only spot of the tray the fudge didn't cover. Soon the tray was licked clean, Mew had chocolate all over her hands and some smeared on her behind. Mew kicked off the nearby wall and pushed the tray off the rack onto the floor and fell down onto the next tray repeating the process only this time she had to sit in some off the fudge until she could clear herself an open spot to sit, at first she wasn't going to eat the fudge she had been seated in but by time the tray was nearing empty she just shrugged and plowed through it. Again the chocolate stained her paws and crumbs were left around her mouth. Mew stood revealing a chocolate mess all over her bum and licked the crumbs from around her face. Another tray was pushed aside and the pink pokemon dropped down another tray. By now her little belly was getting filled but still room remained. When Mew seated herself in the next tray her gut rounded out as she sat and a bulge pushed forward showing how her furry stomach was rounding out but still it was only food not fat yet and Mew was to hungry to take notice. Soon 4 more trays were pushed to the floor licked clean and Mew was on her last one swiping up the last bits. As Mew leaned forward to lick the chocolate away she was taking not of how hard it was getting, the last 3 trays she licked clean she had felt a lump under her as she leaned forward, and every time it seemed bigger. Oblivious to it Mew simply kicked her legs out and balanced on the roll like a ball and spun herself on it licking the pan clean. Mew was satisfied now she had had her fill... but she was still hungry. Mew knew she had eaten plenty, but still the cupcakes remained, and the donuts too. Mew didn't need anymore... but she wanted more. The cupcakes made her mouth water and the donuts made her sweet tooth beg. Mew hopped off the try onto the floor with a heavier landing than she would expect but just assumed her legs were getting tired from this workout. Mew hopped across the floor her movement was more of a side to side hop than it was before as her belly weighed down and she tried to run in a way that didn't bounce it roughly up and down, she was nearing full after all.

Mew scaled the few trays of cupcakes their were, her head coming over the edge of the top one and scooping a cupcake into her mouth as she climbed onto it trying to clear room. Mew sat back against the rack and started picking cupcakes up with her tail and bringing it to her hands where she was unwrapping them and placing the used paper liners in a pile beside her before gobbling them down. Soon she didn't get that far and just let the fall where they were removed some laying ontop of her now stuffed and rounded belly. When the tray emptied she just grabbed more from the tray under her with her tail to comfortable to get up. But her pace slowed and by time she was through half of the next tray she let out a little burp and her head tilted back. Mew burped twice more as her stomach churned and settled and the little pink glutton passed out. She had chocolate smeared on her butt, fudge crumbs ground into the fur on her belly as well as a small stack of cupcake paper draped around it, and sprinkles glued to the area around her mouth with frosting. Mew again dreamed of her strange subjects that wanted to give her something deep in her mind she now lusted for, but she didn't even know what it was yet.

Outside the brawl of slobs and chef's had aroused Mewtwo's anger. He sensed the hostility in the restaurant and became quite upset. In a flash the brawl ended as every one in the kitchen suddenly stopped arms falling limply to their sides as their master invaded their minds and scolded them.

"How dare you behave this way! Most of you are on your way to being glorious slobs! Some of you are fine chefs we need to prepare our lavish meals and will soon join us as righteous slobs. How can you even begin to fight one another? You are all working towards the same goal and as slobs we are above such petty squabbles! You will all behave yourselves and work together on your journey to the path of Slobbitude UNDERSTAND?!" Mewtwo commanded as his subjects all limply nodded drool leaking from their mouths. Mewtwo rewarded his subjects by bringing them plenty of food to eat so they would not have to fight anymore. Mewtwo unlatched the pantry and brought all the food out as well for his slobs to eat. Of course Mew's presence was not overlooked, Mewtwo smiled at Mew's progress and placed a cupcake in her mouth while she slept, Mew began to suck on it unconsciously. Mewtwo decided to remove every crumb from the pantry, He wanted to ensure Mew would go looking for more to eat rather than take advantage of a well stocked pantry and as well his subjects needed their food too. So while Mew slept the pantry was cleaned out, aside for one cupcake of course.

1211211112112112111.content:
Mew slept peacefully digesting the effects of her binge. Still dreams haunted her of desires and urges she couldn't make out but called so strongly to her. Mew's body softened slightly as the sweets she had eaten slowly turned to fat. After a long nap Mew stirred at first rubbing her eyes trying to bring them into focus. Mew looked around at the empty store room, the shelfs were bare and the doors to the coolers were open showing their insides to be empty as well. Mew tilted her head to the side in bewilderment, she had not eaten all the food, and if anyone had entered they would have surely woken her, not that they could, the door was still latched. Mew glanced down at her feet and spied the cupcake Mewtwo had left for her while she was asleep. Without a second thought she scooped the cupcake up and scarfed it down. Mew almost felt odd about her treatment of the cupcake she was eating, as if the mere presence of food before her was enough of an invitation to eat it, hungry or not.

Mew shook off these feelings, it was just appetite is all, if it hadn't been something sweet she probably wouldn't have just felt like eating it like that, she did have a sweet tooth after all. Mew pushed these idle thoughts to the back of her mind, she was getting caught up in pointless pondering while that fat slob menaced an entire city. She had to stop Mewtwo and get him back to his old self. She felt bad knowing this was all her fault, if only she could just turn back time...

Mew tried to test her powers trying to lift the tray she was on. The tray shook slightly tipping side to side unable to get it fully in the air. Mew's face tightens as she tried harder to focus. The tray managed to lift a few inches above the ground and hold there with Mew pushing herself to the max. She didn't have god control over it as the tray kept dipping to one side or the other threatening to fall again and she wasn't able to hold it in one place as the tray slowly turned and moved back and forth in a small area in the center of the room like a hockey puck on an air hockey table. Mew's face started to turn red and she became exhausted. Mew let out a grunt of pain as she lost her mental hold and the tray smack the floor sending slight ripples through Mew's softer body. Mew was going to need more time before her powers came back fully....

But First Mew was going to lick the crumbs off her paws.

Back in the Wilson family household the family was making great progress into their decent of Slob-dom, or rather accent to glorious slob-dom as Cindy Wilson and Matthew Wilson saw it. Sammantha Wilson their daughter lay on the couch stuffed to bursting rubbing her belly in slow circles moaning. Her pokemon lay next to her, Her Bellsprout had passed out 15 minuets ago, it's eyes rolled back and stem like body puffed out in a way few had ever seen a bellsprout swell, the pokemon's body resembles a snake that had swallowed a creature many times it's size whole and now had the massive lump stuck in it's digestive track. Marill on the end was actually taking to this treatment still going strong stuffing food into her mouth. Marill was no longer the small perfectly round pokemon she once was, She was now shaped more like a pear as her round head sat atop an even rounder belly that had grown larger than the rest of her body and now hung down pushing her legs further apart and making her center of gravity awkward. This was not a problem however as she had no plans of moving while she lay on her back and begged for more food from Sammantha's mother.

"Marill Marill!" Marill cried happily and opened her mouth wide.

"Oh my you want more sweetie?" Cindy smiled at her daughter's pokemon. Cindy herself sported a much more rounded gut and had spread her legs slightly to accommodate the fleshy orb she cradled lovingly in her lap. Unlike Sammantha and her Pokemon who all had food smudges around their mouths from where Cindy had been forcing the food into them, Cindy herself had large hunks of foodstuffs and generous globs of various sweet juices and creamy frosting dotted around her mouth that she wore proudly in addition to the steady trickle of drool that flowed from one corner of her mouth.

"Here you go Marill dear" Cindy gladly leaned over her stuffed gut to pass more brownies to Marill, She simply sat the plate on Marill's belly and let the blue pokemon dive face first into the pile eating them right off her belly which was rising like dough to meet her mouth with each mouthful of food she swallowed. "Sammantha dear you and your bellsprout need to be more like that Marill of yours, She is a fine example of what a young lady should be" Cindy smiled warmly at her daughter then looked back to Marill, admiring her hunger.

"Ugh... Yes mommy..." Sammantha groaned and grabbed another cupcake cramming it into her mouth.

"Dad I can't eat anymore..." Mark whined across the room his father offering another slice of pie to his son.

"Mark now now, that's no way to think. We want to get into shape don't we? Come on our family has a bright future ahead of it and being full has no place in it" His father reminded him pushing the pie into his mouth.

"Guah, wuff, ruahhh, wugug!" Mark mumbled through the food chewing it quickly and swallowing to be able to speak again. "Dad what on earth are you going on about?! Don't you know you exercise to get in shape?! And what is this bight new future you keep talking about? Gee all this food is making Snubbull sick!" Mark protested. Indeed next to Mark his Snubull was puffed out almost as bad as Marill was and unlike Marill he looked as if he was going to lose his meal at any second.

"Exercise?!" Both Matthew and Cindy echoed in unison "Son I never want to hear you use that foul word ever again!" Matthew spat sticking his tongue out in disgust, Cindy covered Shammantha's ears to keep her from hearing the word anymore. "As for Snubbull, he and Bellsprout are just going to need to try harder, the master won't allow such small appetites."

"M... Master?" Mark asked puzzled "Dad you've lost it, who or what is this stupid master you're talking about. Dad this is insane!"

As if on cue the doors and windows to the Wilson family flew open. Mark and Sammatha looked around wildly scared, Sammantha even started screaming.

"You've done well so far..." A voice echoed through the living room

"Thank you master!" Cindy and Matthew eagerly barked grinning lowering their heads to the disembodied voice.

"Who? Wha?!" Mark stuttered while Sammantha panted in fear her voice trembling.

"Here, I shall move things along but it is still up to you to show them the way.." The voice spoke again as a breeze started to softly roll into the living room. With the breeze a strange odor followed as a thicker mist seemed to fill the room.

"UGH!" Mark reeled in disgust "What smells like rotten eggs?!"

"It's wonderful!" Matthew breathed heavily

"Glorious!" Cindy chimed in and took a deep breath herself

'Mommy I feel funny..." Sammantha groaned looking a little pale.

"Sweetie tell mommy" Cindy smiled in anticipation "What do you feel..?"

"I... I..." Sammantha tried to speak but something was holding her back. Sammantha looked like she was about to throw up as her mouth hung open uncertainly and her chest kept heaving irregularly as something worked it's way toward her mouth. "I feel like I'm bout to..." Sammantha started when suddenly it came:

"UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURP" sammantha belched loudly. Everyone grew silent and looked at Sammantha, her parents wide eyed as if they were waiting for something big to happen, and it did. As sammantha's burp subsided her belly seemed to rise slightly as her back arched. Sammantha let out another burp albeit smaller but as she did her body seemed to puff out as her stomach shrunk slightly. Sammantha burped twice more each time her body swelled and softened as her stuffed belly digested the food and fat began to thicken her body. Sammantha's clothes were tight across her belly the buttons straining to stay on and her pants looked like she was just poured into little girl pajamas meant for a girl several sizes smaller than she was. Sammantha's eyes got wide and she burped once more. "Braaaap" She let loose and the seams of her pants split wide open and more than half the buttons on her shirt burst off flying across the room.

'Mommy I'm hungry!" Sammantha suddenly lit up smiling as if she hadn't just gone from a girl stuffed full at a size 11 to a plus sized girl at size 18. Sammantha rubbed her hand on her gut as it growled loudly crying out for food her belly now big enough to sit in her lap. Sammantha began to drool slightly at the sight of food still uneaten laying in the middle of the floor.

"Oh of course honey theres plenty of food for my big growing girl!" Cindy beamed with pride and grabbed a package of chocolate chip cookies and started to open them in front of her daughter. Sammantha was so eager for the cookies however that she bolted forward and snatched them from her mother's hands tipping the package back and dumping a few into her mouth and chewing happily. 'That's my girl" Cindy smiled and wiped a tear of joy from her eye.

"Sam!" Mark stared flabbergasted "What on earth is wrong with you?! You just turned into a blimp after eating enough food to fill a truck... HOW CAN YOU BE HUNGRY?!" Mark yelled scared of what was happening

"Shut up Mark I'm hungry!" Sammantha whined shoving a can of whip cream into her mouth and trying to spray as much as she could into her bulging cheeks until it filled them completely and got whip cream all over the sides of her cheeks.

"Sam you have to... whoa what was that...?" Mark suddenly bent over clutching his stomach. He knew what was coming, he could feel it. Mark suddenly let out a loud burp and his stomach shrunk sending fat into the rest of his body puffing his boyish frame slightly. "Nooo..." Mark moaned as another set of burps forced their way out "Urp" "arrrup" "ruuuuurp" each letting his belly reduce in size as his body started to fill out making his clothes tighter. Mark could still feel it, the big one, the one that would push his body over the edge into a chubby out of shape mess and make him a food disposal unit like his sister who was now letting their mother pour a series of 2 litter of soda bottles into her like she was a giant glass. Mark fought back the burp. He clamped his mouth shut and tried to force the bubbling gases back down his throat. Mark manage to hold off the last burp for as long as he could when suddenly.

"PHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHFT" a muffled eruption of gases could be heard through the cushions Mark was sitting on. Mark's face turned red as he felt his stomach bottom out growing vastly hungrier as if he had not eaten in days. Mark gritted his teeth fighting back his sudden desires for food as the last of the gases he had fought back as a burp managed to pop out a few small bursts in the form of farts leaving him feeling weak from hunger.

"D-dad.." Mark meekly mumbled

"Yes son..?" His father said smiling waiting for what he knew was coming

It killed Mark to admit it, but he couldn't fight it "Dad I'm hungry" He said at last a drop of saliva cresting over the corner of his lip.

Marks father happily handed his son a large cheeseburger that he immediately devoured.

Following suit of their owners Sammantha's and Mark's pokemon joined their trainers. Bellspout awoke with a loud burp as it's stem like body got thicker and softening irregularly, even the leaves seemed to plump as Bellsprout quickly got to work shoving food into it's mouth. Snubbull's eyes grew wide as a series of farts shook him back to consciousness making the pokemon's pink body round out considerably making him roll back further and reached up begging for food which Mark's father quickly gave him.

Marill seemed to have the most fun with it letting out a burp and fart in alternating bursts and feeling the shockwaves it sent through her softening frame. When it was finished Marill was back to nearly a ball shape again but her front seemed to hang down more as her belly fat couldn't keep that perfect ball shape and her cheeks puffed out giving her two rounded bumps on either side of her mouth which seemed to channel the new stream of drool in a straight line down the front of her belly onto the cushions.

Cindy and Matthew also relished the feeling of their bodies growing as the food the had stuffed themselves with turned to fat although unlike their children the gains were not represented by farts or burps, they were happily farting and burping already so their bodies puffed up normally until their clothes could barely hold them in. Cindy and Matthew stood and proudly reveled in their growing slob glory and left their children and their pokemon to get more food for the growing family. As Cindy and Matthew ran to the basement to raid the storage fridge their Kids and pokemon crammed more food into their eager mouths unable to quench this new hunger.


---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------

Mew slowly pulled the latch off the door and pulled back on the handle opening the door out of the food storage room in the restaurant. Mew leapt down onto the floor causing her feet to ache as the impact of her new weight sent a wave of pain into her tiny paws which weren't even accustomed to holding her normal weight much less the poundage she had gained from her binge, not that she noticed the gain, she just assumed it was her body getting sore from all this walking when she should be flying.

Mew tiptoed through the mass of sleeping slobs thankful they had passed out so she didn't have to reveal herself in order to leave. Mew wasn't even sure why she was leaving, the empty pantry was a nice hiding spot, she could crawl into one of the dark cupboards and wait for her powers to come back but the pantry was lacking something... Mew couldn't place it but something about a pantry with no food in it was a depressing place to stay and she needed positive emotions if her powers were going to return to her.

Slipping back into the cold dark alleyway Mew realized it was late at night, she had been passed out for hours. Mew hurried down the ally the tops of her paws bursting the bottom of her belly as she tried to awkwardly run with her arms outstretched for balance. Mew didn't get far however, after only a block and a half Mew was panting heavily her pace slowed to a near crawl. Mew was actually starting to sweat from the physical exertion. She leaned against a dumpster and tried to catch her breath. Mew looked about the ally curious if anyone might catch her back here. Between buildings Mew could see much of the city looked deserted as now nearly half the population was either succumbing to Mewtwo's lure of slob life either by force or choice, or had been taken hostage by a friend or family member who was a slob now and wished to spread the joy to those around them. Many of these new Slob no matter their means of conversion had flocked to one of the many piles of food throughout the city and were joining in to massive slobby feasts taking place there.

Mew lumbered around the dumpster looking for a new place to hide. Mew found relief when the ally began to slope slightly down hill making walking much simpler. Mew picked up her pace moving through the dank city ally. Mew suddenly realized her speed was increasing, as she had been looking for a place to hide away the slope of the hill grew steeper and with it Mew was walking much faster unable to slow her paws as they landed with heavy smacks against the pavement. Mew's limited experience with walking meant she had never run down a slope so fast she couldn't stop and Mew's new weight wasn't going to make this an easy learning experience. Mew barreled down the ally trying to slow herself down by extending her arms and trying to catch more wind.

Ahead of Mew a small inner-city food market had a large commotion in front of it. A horde of human slobs and soon to be slobs were all pounding on the front doors demanding to be let in. Inside a small group of pokemon trying to save the people, some of whom were their trainers, from a slob fate by barricading the doors. The windows where a rather strong Glaceon had used blizzard to cake the store front's glass windows with a thick sheet of ice preventing entry. Sadly the pokemon had not taken into account how ineffective they would be to their trainers once they were locked in the market behind the sheet of ice. Outside the trainers began to give up seeking new sources of food leaving their pokemon inside the food filled fridge. Mewtwo had decided not to intervene and let his slob follows into the store, because now he had a small group of anti slob pokemon right where he wanted them.

Mew was now running uncontrollably down the hill, the wall of the super market coming into view Mew realized she couldn't stop. Mew was going to smash into the brick wall of the back of the super market fast enough to seriously injure her. Mew had to think fast but the only was out was a small window just above the wall but it was to high for her weak out of shape legs to make the jump for. Mew had to risk everything and try to lift her self with her powers just long enough to fly into the window. Mew narrowed her eyes focusing on the window and concentrated on the image of herself flying gracefully through the window unharmed. Mew's paws still hit the pavement heavily indicating she had not lifted any of her weight yet. Mew kept focusing her mind on flight, and the safety of that window. Still Mew could feel the weight of her body with every bounding footstep. Mew shut her eyes and hoped for the best as she came within 10 feet of the wall. At the last second Mew kicked off the ground with all her strength and aimed for the window.

Mew felt time slow to a crawl as her wellbeing hung in the balance. Mew held her breath as she lifted a foot off the ground, then two feet. Mew's heart sank and she felt her vertical ascension slow and she began to reach the peak of her jump after barely getting 2 feet off the ground. Mew threw her entire body forward and pushed herself to fly. Mew thought she hung in the air there for an eternity fighting gravity until she got a most unexpected boost.

"Prrrrrrrfp" Mew suddenly farted. Mew's face turned red as she realized what she had done but no sooner had she done so than a sudden kick of speed lift her body and gently whisked her through the window letting her slowly land inside. Mew's eyes were horrified as her lack of control over her own body. Mew had never even so much as burped before much less fart. Mew did not care for this new development at all. But Mew could put it aside, her powers seemed to be returning and she could face Mewtwo soon and put an end to this. More importantly though she could cast off this horrid walking business and fly again. Mew tried to lift herself off the ground but nothing happened. Mew shook her head and tried again, nothing. Mew placed her face in her palms. This was terrible, her powers were still on the frits, they only worked briefly after she did that ghastly bodily function and then they cut out again what was going on with her body??

Mew had to put this mystery aside for now though. A sudden clatter from the next room tuned Mew into her surroundings. Mew was in a dimly lit storage room for the cleaning supplies and maintenance room for the food market. Mew crept to the door and peered through. Mew could see right into the main area of the store where all the aisles were. Around the super market Mew could see the pokemon that had locked themselves inside and they were...

Charmander gazed up nervously at the huge door, shifting his red mawashi into a more comfortable position, and hoping to well up enough courage to knock it. Batting away the butterflies in his stomach, he commited the action, and waited breathlessly for an answer.

Ever since he discovered his passion for sumo wrestling, Charmander had been reading up on its background and techniques. As he had absorbed all of the information, he eventually concluded that he wanted to become one himself, so with only a recently bought mawashi and some currency hidden on his person, he began to explore the area for sumo schools.

The search was more difficult than expected, since there were no said institution where Charmander lived. He expanded his exploration outside the town limits and after much asking and eavesdropping, he learned of a sumo academy in a secluded part of the continent that's rarely heard about. It's seclusion worried Charmander, for schools like those rarely enrolled everyone that just walked up to their doors and asked to be emitted in.

He waited nervously, bouncing on one foot to the other, until a slide slot was opened to reveal a pair of narrowed red eyes.

"What is it?" a growling voice demanded. "What do you want?"

Charmander jumped and began shaking, watching those scary eyes warily.

"Um...sir." he meeped. "I was wondering...I am sure you wouldn't accept...but..."

"Just spit it out!"

"C-can I join your school and...b-become a sumo wrestler?" he finished.

Charmander felt the eyes taking in every detail of his person in the long silence that followed. Finally, the doors slowly squealed open.

"Come in." the voice simply stated.

Charmander complied, adjusting his mawashi quickly as he entered. When the doors shut, darkness descended and he shuddered as a very large presence made itself known beside him.

"Follow me."

Their trek onward was silent as Charmander's eyes tried to adjust to the darkness. He failed, but that didn't stop him from attempting to swinging his glance around everywhere they went. Eventually, a metal door came into view and the presence waved a hand towards it.

choices: Hear Nurse Joy telling Katie a fake history lesson
145112.content:
Katie looked back at the porky police officer as she waddled to her bike. Katie couldn't believe the young woman had let herself go so much, most of the Jenny family were tall slender and well kept but this one was so fat she burst through every seem in her uniform as it threatened to tear to pieces, even her skirt was so small more than half her large rear hung out showing her pink panties quite clearly as the blubbery cheeks swayed side to side with her waddle. As for the well kept clean cut professional look officer Jenny's were know for, this one didn't seem to even clean her uniform, not that she would be able to get it back on, if she even managed to get it off in one piece at all. The fat female cop just huffed as she swung her thick thighs over the side of her reinforced motor bike, despite heavy plates along the side to strengthen the bike's weight capacity the bike still squealed loudly as her weight bore down on it and the tires sank until they looked almost flat. Slowly the fat officer rolled away on her bike muttering something in a rather upset tone about having to report to city hall before she could get herself anymore snacks.

Katie shrugged and went inside, Katie wasn't stupid, quite the obvious she was a very intelligent girl, but somehow her common sense was.... lacking so to speak. In fact regardless of her note worthy understanding of the world around her she was often seen as a ditz for missing even the most obvious of details. This is perhaps why She had missed the fact Donut town was not only removed from the official pokemon trainer route's but also several warnings had been issued for all trainers and travelers alike to avoid the region entirely due to a very high number of trainers who had visited the area on their quest and never returned home...

The double wide doors to the Pokemon center slid open as Katie and her Evee approached them. Evee began to slow down and let out a low growl cautioning Katie to slow just as she put one foot inside.

Katie looked at her Evee puzzled "What is it Evee?" Katie said bending slightly to looked her only pokemon more closely in the eye, Since Katie was a bit of a ditz she often failed to throw the pokeball at the right time or downright left them behind at the pokeshop she bought them at. None the less this only gave her more time to bond with Evee, they were almost like sisters one could say.

"Eve! Eve! Evee!" The small brown pokemon cried out in protest getting a bad feeling about this place. The Evee took several steps backwards and called out again.

Katie giggled at Evee's reluctance to come in. "Oh come on Eve! Remember what that fat toll booth operator back on the road said! This place is the best, they have all kinds of special training programs to improve pokemon and trainer cooperation! It's the whole reason we changed out route to come to this place. I bet since it's not on the official course we'll have a leg up on the copatition when we get to the grand tournament if we're the only ones with this training. Now lets go!" Katie said pinching Evee's left ear and tugging softly. Evee cooed over the pressure knowing it was one of her weak spots and trotted along behind her trainer as Katie pulled her in by the ear.

Inside Katie looked around at the weird design. The flow of the center seemed to force new arrivals straight to Nurse Joy's reception desk were a pink blob sat. Katie couldn't help but find the humming of the lights inside annoying, this was louder than normal florescent light humming too, it was almost like a speaker somewhere was letting out a low pitched whine. As Katie neared it the blob became more recognizable as a very very fat Chansey, The faithful assistant of all Nurse Joy this one seemed to just sit behind her desk eating from a near by basket of Pokemon food. The massively fat Nurse pokemon took little notice of their approach more interested in bringing more food to her mouth leaving behind a trail of crumbs across her flab. She didn't even care Katie was asking for assistance until Katie reached forward and lightly touched the Chansey's flab. The Chansey flailed her stubby arms wildly and wailed at Katie quite upset at the inturuption. Before a familiar voice calmed her.

"Now now Chansey dear the poor girl only needs help" Spoke Nurse Joy in a soft tone. Katie turned to see Nurse Joy sitting in a scooter parked in the hallway. Just like Officer Jenny this Nurse Joy was a great deal fatter than her sisters, her seditary job had allowed her to grow much fatter than the Officer but she just as messy. Nurse Joy's pink nurse uniform was in pieces and the only thing keeping her modesty was a tightly stretched apron covering her large chest. As for her lower half the nurse's slab of a belly poured down from under her apron and covered her legs down to her knees meaning even if no clothing was left down that far nothing could be seen anyway. All over her body various smears and spots of dribbled food sat on her. Nurse Joy tried to smile warmly at Katie like all Nurse Joy did but ruined the trademark smirk with a large belch and several after burps that sent shockwaves through her flab.

"Hello young lady how can we assist you today?" Nurse Joy asked after the ripples subsided and eyed Katie up and down like a slab of meat ready to be cut. "You look positively famished dear! come come lets get you to the Pokemon Center Cafeteria!" Nurse Joy suggested and quickly spun her scooter around giving Katie an eye full of her fat behind spilling out over the tiny seat.

"No actually I came for some training... um Nurse Joy?" Katie called out trying to catch her "Miss! Miss I really need that training!" Katie took off after the scooter, Evee moved closer to her trained and tried to remain alert still uneasy about the center.

As Katie started to catch up she came to a hallway passing through the tables for the cafeteria and Katie was shocked by what she saw. More than the fact that the center had far less trainers than any other center usually had, was the few trainers she did see. Seated at tables that looked more like couches with adjustable tables the trainers all seemed to range from the 200 pound mark to the 400 pound mark. Boys and Girls dotted the large eating area seated at tables covered in food just stuffing their faces without concern for how much of the food wound up on them and not in their mouths. The eating area was a symphony of slurps, gobbles, chops, chews, burps, belches and worse every now and then a faint rubble could be heard as one of the dinners passed gas. TVs everywhere kept the attention of the young trainers with cartoons and goofy shows, but they weren't any Katie recognized, they all had prominently obese characters and the screens seemed to flicker every other frame like the TV's couldn't maintain the picture. It wasn't even just the trainers getting into it either, at their feet their pokemon all lay slouched over feeding bowls being refilled constantly by dispensers by the bowl, even though it differed from pokemon to pokemon most of them just looked like fat little balls of fur with pudgy legs and paws uselessly hanging out the side of their fat frames. And still the humming of those lights wore on Katie's patience and her mind.

"Yes you're lucky you got here when you did" The Nurse Joy broke in pulling Katie away from the sight of a girl not much older than her but three times her size who had a bowl of ice cream tipped in the air and was chugging it like she was dying of thirst. "You look like you'd blow away if the wind blew hard enough, You know it's not healthy to be so malnourished dear" Joy cautioned her.

"Malnourished!?" Katie repeated under her breath, "my mom is always telling me I'm in danger of getting fat with the way I eat, what's with this place...?"

The fat nurse apparently heard more than Katie intended because suddenly she brought up the subject of Donut town itself. "Well dear do you want to hear our little town's history?"

"Well you see..." Katie began
145112.title: Same faces, new bodies

choices: Katie resists and escapes with Evee to investigate
1451122.content:
Donut Town was really no different than any other town actually it had been founded many years before and lead an average existence until it had the great fortune of being selected for a part in one of the many towns included in the Pokemon Trainer's League Official Route. This brought with it a Pokemon Center, the Officer Jenny protection force many new shops and restaurants and of course booming tourism industry. The town flourished and grew, but despite being a different kind of average, the town was still an average town on the long road to the Pokemon Leagues. That was, until Seven years ago.


**************************************************************************** ***************************
***************************************~Seven Years Earlier~**************************************
**************************************************************************** ***************************

On a cold stormy night on the edge of town a mud covered Drowzee stumbled out of the bushes badly hurt. The victim of a cruel beating by several foul tempered children from Donut town the Drowzee now sought help from the town that spawned the children that attacked him. Knowing little of humans and preferring to avoid them the Drowzee knew only rumors of the Pokemon Center and hoped desperately that he could find it and be saved. However he had no way of knowing where it was and soon found himself on the back step of one of the quiet houses of Donut Town. Trying to get someone's attention all he could manage to do was scratch meekly. To his fortune the Mother of the household heard him and came to investigate, yet to his dismay the aid he had hoped for was not found there as the woman screamed at him calling him a wild animal and kicked him away from the door swiftly, slamming it as fast as she could and locking it. As Drowzee picked himself up he managed to look inside at the humans who had turned their back on him in his hour of need. There a family of 5 sat, the mother who had hit him, the father, the son, the daughter, and a young baby. All of them eating there dinner. Slopping food on their plates and stuffing their faces. There was plenty of food to go around in this warm safe abode and yet they refused to share any of it with him, as if on cue his own belly growled for food. Angrily the Drowzee turned his back on the scene and moved to the next house. Yet his reception here had been no better. Once again he found himself thrust out into the cold wet night his wounds aching and his stomach growing more and more famished. As Drowzee left in a huff he stumbled over their garbage cans. Drowzee came crashing to the ground hurting his chin. Looking up at the garbage spilled his eyes lit up at the prospect of finding something to eat in the spilled contents of the garbage can. But nothing edible remained, a slop of meshed up food oozed out sprinkles with rotten apple cores and moldy bread Drowzee was enraged that not only did the Humans so selfishly horde their good fortune, but wasted it so freely even ruining what they didn't use. Again and again it was the same scene that met his pleas to assistance. Humans throwing him out, Humans wasting perfectly good supplies and items turning them into garbage to pollute the world, and worse of all humans stuffing their faces!

Drowzee began to grow listless over these sights, he paced down the street his wounds seeming less and less important. Drowzee was angry, these pitiful humans had to be taught a lesson. They all needed to be put him their place! A faint glow began to rise up off his body, Drowzee's wounds healed and his mind focused. Filling with power Drowzee could feel his anger welling up inside him giving him a clear picture of his revenge coming to realization. Drowzee rose off the ground as the power surrounded him, in a flash his anger and determination evolved him to a Hypno. Hypno landed again and set right to work teaching his lesson. Sending out hypnotic waves for miles Hypno captured the minds of every human of the Donut Town region. His rage empowered him to pull all their minds to him and bend their wills to his own design. If these humans were going to be such greedy messy pigs then that's what he would make them! That night the entire population threw their modesty and concern for anything but food out the window. Hypno took control of the government setting up his own home in Town hall to rule over his slobbery minions. Over the next few weeks the population's obesity exploded. Every home, school yard, and place of public business was full of over weight humans stuffing their faces growing out of their clothes making a mess of themselves. The town was addicted to food and gave up any concern for anything else.But it wasn't long before the warmer months approached and the official training season began. With it came trainers along the official routes and for an unlucky bunch, right to Donut town. Hypno did not take kindly to these intruders in his town poking their nose into the population's new eating habits, personal hygiene, or manners. Hypno tried to bring their minds into his control but the trainers minds were focused and fresh as were their pokemon, And Hypno wasn't as strong as he had been in his fit of rage. As well Hypno himself was succumbing to the lifestyle he crated for the town as his fat servants brought him the same food and manners he had forced on them. Hypno had gown fat himself and was losing his concern for his own wellbeing. As such Hypno was forced to bring the trainers under his thumb in more conventional terms. Sending out Officer Jenny to meet and make reports on all new arrivals then make sure they stayed long enough to become like everyone else Hypno ensured no more meddlesome government agencies poke their noses in with surveys on obesity rates or investigations about eating habits. Hypno had Nurse Joy beginning the conditioning with super addictive food to give trainers and their pokemon along with a mind numbing hum in the poke center to weaken their resistance and subliminal messages in the music and TV's It wasn't long before a build up of trainers began to form in the town, not allowed to leave and slowly getting out of shape their attempts to escape grew less and less as they fell under the spell of the food and overall attitude of the populace slowly becoming slobs themselves bursting out of their clothing. Over time the flow of trainers slowed as more and more people became concerned with the disappearances of both trainers and the investigators sent to find them. Within 3 years the Town's population doubled with their now permanent residence and they all shared the same pastimes, Eating, and turning every visitor they got into slobs like them. Now 4 years later Hypno's power has grown as much as his weight. As each new resident settled in and submitted to his will they joined their minds with his to give him power and now from atop his fat laden food stained throne Hypno was ready to expand his kingdom...


**************************************************************************** *************************


Back in the present Nurse Joy finished telling Katie and Evee her long winded lie about the town being a happy place were everyone loved it so much they stayed for the great people who won them over. Katie didn't understand the story fully, Nurse Joy spoke as if the town had no weight problems, as if it was just like any other town you could go to and nothing was out of the ordinary. Evee was getting restless her feeling they were being watched grew. Suddenly Nurse joy came to a stop.

"We're here!" She happily beamed and rolled to a buffet of food steaming hot beckoning to Katie and Evee. The smell of the food filled their nostrils and made their heads spin with hunger. The low hum in the Pokemon center was making it so hard to think and the food looked so good...
1451122.title: Puppet Town

choices: Katie wakes up hungry but sluggish
Katie wakes to Nurse Joy passing by with new trainers
14511221.content:
Katie looked back and forth over the array of tasty foods before her. Everything was cooked to perfection and seemed to glow under the heat lamps. The shine of the lights on the food, the smell over powering the air, and the fact Katie was on a diet and had not eaten all day weakened her resistance. The food called to Katie and her Evee, the hum in the center de-focusing their thoughts and bore the image of the food straight to their minds and into their stomachs as both trainer and pokemon let out a loud deep growl from their slim bellies.

Katie braced herself, she was on a diet after all, she would just get a salad to start with to fill her up then maybe some dessert. Katie looked around at the display of food and found it odd the salad bar was not immediately seen. Salad bars were cheap to stock so most places put them out front so patrons would fill up on cheap greens before eating the more expensive food. At last Katie spied it in the far back against the poorly lit wall. The lights in back flickered as if they were going bad and no one cared enough to replace them and the greens didn't look all that green from where Katie stood suggesting no one ever changed them but Katie was sure this we just her eyes playing tricks on her and grabbed a plate for her and Evee and started to walk around the buffet towards the poorly kept salad bar. As Katie and Evee trotted along the display of food however Katie couldn't help but glance over at the food whose heady smell was driving her hunger so wild, soon Katie had stopped looking where she was going and just stared at the food she was passing. Fried chicken, glazed ham, four cheese potato scalap, lasagna dripping with a greasy tomato sauce. Katie's pace slowed with each temptation and each new dish made the salad bar seem further and further away until her legs came to a rest in front of a huge slab of cheese filled casserole. Katie bit her lip and looked around unsure what to do. Katie tried to find the salad bar again but her hunger surged and everything beyond the buffet before her seemed shrouded in darkness unimportant to her growing hunger. Katie looked to Evee for support but Evee had hopped onto the counter to investigate what Katie was stopped for and now was staring at the food that had also tempted Katie. Evee whimpered and her legs started to buckle as Evee couldn't bring herself to hop back off the counter away from the temptation. Katie looked back to the food her stomach demanding she fill it her will power ebbed away. Slowly Katie's hand lifted itself to the counter grasping the spoon and dug deep in to the creamy rich casserole. The slurping sound of the moist cheese spreading to let the spoon into the casserole drove Katie wild with anticipation about the taste, Evee just let her tongue out as she eagerly watched Katie spoon a generous helping for them both onto their plates and turned back headed the other way on the bar with Evee hurrying behind her as eager as Katie to sit down and each. Katie headed for the cash register planning to just pay for this food then be done, but then she passed the butter cover rolls which found a handful tossed into both their plates along side the casserole already taking up much of the room, then she passed the flakey buttery chicken calzones which she just had to add a few on top her and Evee's pile and slather it in marinara sauce. Evee watched her trainer load their plates with a mountain of food but didn't dare protest the fact she could never eat the human sized proportions, she was just to hungry to watch Katie put any of it back. Finally after needing to add some fried chicken, not being able to pass the marshmallow cover sweet potatoes without pushing a scoop next to the piles, and the smoked salmon just found it's way onto the pile Katie struggled to balance the plates as she stepped up to the cashier. However Katie found nothing there but a display screen above the register that said "free of charge". Katie looked back to Nurse Joy to confirm but the over stuffed Nurse was no where to be found. A quick scan of the area showed no one of authority just a multitude of obese trainers stuffing their faces, Katie got the idea and looked for a seat. Katie and Evee picked a table at the far end of the Cafeteria close to the entrance where she first came in because most of the young trainers had taken seats near the buffet itself and Katie and Evee were somewhat creeped out by the way neither the pokemon could ever aknowlage anything aside from their food or the TV's they were glued to.

Katie came to her chosen seat and took a moment to study it. The seat was wide like a couch and obviously had deep thick cushions. The table was crescent shaped on a flexible arm that pivoted from one side of the chair so you could sit in the chair and adjust the table to fit your required distance. Katie took a seat and sank into the pillowy cushions, it felt like Katie was floating on air and her muscles instantly relaxed. Katie felt a shudder of pleasure wash over her as her slim butt sank in feeling a warmth within the seat heating it. Katie could almost fall asleep right there if her hunger wasn't so overpowering. Katie just let the pleasure washing over her as a soft coo and looked to the table. Katie pulled the table closer to reach her food and Evee leapt up onto the cushion beside her then to the table to reach her plate. Katie scanned the edge of the table closest to her and found a small array of buttons to be played with. Katie didn't want to break anything by pushing random buttons but she did find the recognizable shape of a TV remote nestled in the cluster of buttons and gave it a try. Katie watched the TV before her flicker to life with the same uneven blinking all the TVs seemed to have but after studying it for a few moments it was actually less noticeable than Katie thought as the more she watched the less she could even tell the TV was blinking at all. She soon found a show featuring two very fat women discussing the latest in trendy fashion and must have gadgets. Katie thought the girls looked familiar but still knew they looked nothing like anyone she knew, but in fact they were. Stacey Marquies a young Brazilian fashion star and Gwen Douglas a 20 something home trends guru were once a pair of TV consonants about what's what in today's hippest crowd till they disappeared in the middle of a cross country tour to update everyone's wardrobe and living room one town at a time 3 years ago. Now the two young women and their camera crew were permanent residents of Donut Town and all at least 350 pounds heavier, It was no wonder Katie couldn't recognize them under the layers of flab and food stains that ran down their trendy dresses. Now their shows focused more on which of today's fashions could stand up to a avalanche of belly without splitting at the seems and which patterns looked the cutest with all your food satins, ironically fashion wasn't that big in Donut Town since everyone was slobs and could sit around naked for all they cared, but the shows were comforting to the young girls in town who once obsessed over what they wore everyday before they became drooling messy slobs, the shows helped them feel like they were still on the cutting edge of fashion even if all they wore were tattered stained shirts and the most elastic pants they could.

Katie's stomach roared puling her back to why she was here in the first place: to eat. Katie tore into the pile of food scooping down into the casserole and placing the spoon in her mouth, the flavor melted into her tongue and Katie moaned at the shock of taste that hit her. She moved the spoon fasted grabbing a larger spoonful faster this time and bite down hard on the spoon trying to drive her tongue into the cheesy casserole as much as she could. After Several bites Katie only found herself getting hungrier and hungrier, Katie stopped trying to aim for the casserole and started just digging her spoon down the entire length of the pile scooping multiple dishes into her fork and spoon and stuffing them in her mouth feeling the explosion of flavor and shuddering with delight. Katie's pace quickened as the powerful appetite stimulants in the food began to run their course driving Katie's hunger through the roof. Soon Katie was leaned down with her face inches from the food shoveling the food in as fast as she could chew. Evee on the other hand was on the table face first in her platter wolfing down the food as fast as Katie. Evee started with small bites but they grew larger and larger until Evee simply buried her muzzle in the mush of food and started slurping it up.

Both trainer and pokemon inhaled their food for fifteen minuets until Evee backed off from her plate and let her knees buckle till the poor little pokemon was trying to rest on the table but was really resting on top a stuffed belly that swelled forward from her body and forced the Pokemon to rock back and forth on the round belly that was nearly a quarter of her own body size. Evee groaned in discomfort and rolled onto her back kicking her legs limply to the sides and panted stuffed full. Katie tipped her plate back and licked it clean dribbling a few specks of food across the top of her shirt. Katie still had the presence of mind to dab at them with a napkin but there were none to be found, napkins were of no use to a slob after all. Katie just lifted her shirt to her mouth and licked the spots up leaving slight stains in their place. Katie glanced up at her Pokemon, Evee was in pain from how stuffed she was. Evee had eaten close to half the pile of food on her plate and had specks of food all across the front of her furry face. Katie eyed what was left of Evee's plate and felt her own stomach gurgle. Katie had eaten her entire serving, she wasn't far from eating more than she had ever eaten in a single serving and yet Katie still felt like she was starving. In a display of no manners Katie reached forwards and pulled Evee's plate to her and dug in, unable to find her spoon at first Katie simply grabbed shoved her face to the food and slurped up bites making a mess around her mouth. Soon Katie's wandering hand found the spoon nearby and brought it to the plate shoveling the pile forward to her eager mouth. Katie soon scooped the contents of the plate into her mouth and once again licked the plate clean getting more food onto her shirt. Katie leaned back in the fluffy seat feeling satisfied. Katie looked down at her shirt and saw more stained but she was just to full to try to licked them off again. Katie rubbed her stuffed belly that poked up pushing her shirt out of the way. Katie felt a rumble of gas push up her throat, Katie started to let it out freely but at the last moment choked it back to a silent burp and managed a meek "Excuse me".

Katie looked around the table her head felt fuzzy. The combination of the hum in the air and the TV's subliminal messages assaulting her subconscious that was now weakened by the itis that was setting in from her food binge Katie's head wasn't quite responding like she wanted. Katie did notice she had eaten Evee's food without asking
and quickly apologized

"I'm sorry Eve I didn't mean to eat your food like that, I was hungry and you didn't seem to be eating anymore so I..." Katie tried to explain but Evee just whimpered in pain and Katie decided the message was received. Katie relaxed more into the plush of the chair and felt herself falling asleep. Katie took one last look at the mess she had made on the table and the few specks of food on her shirt and decided to clean it up later just as her eyes shut and she drifted to sleep.

145122111.title: Let's go to the other room now. I'm full!

14512212.content: Glaceon was carried down the hall. Suddenly, a blindfold fell around her head! In a room, she felt something around her, but she couldn't tell what. She shook off the blindfold and saw she was wearing a full bodysuit, in a nice outside setting. She walked over to a pool and sat near it, touching the water. It seemed warm, so she sat inside. Glaceon missed the fact that her bodysuit was filling up with water, and the ice in her body froze it over. What the Glaceon didn't know was that she was gaining lots of new layers of ice on top of her body, and whenever she wanted, it could become a new paunch! Her bodysuit had a special property, however... she couldn't notice the ice forming in the relaxing water. Then, when the ice filled the tiny hot tub, an injection poked into her arm through the suit. Due to the calming water, she didn't notice her body swelling to accommodate the ice. The suit shrunk to its normal, size, and the feeling of tightness was so uncomfortable she walked out. The skinny Glaceon now had a bubble paunch that was about 2 and a half feet circumference. However, due to her flabby legs, she could manage a waddle. The suit kept her looking and seeming normal, however, and results were displayed on a tiny screen to her trainer, Evan. Glaceon was escorted out of the room and to the cafeteria for dinner.
14512212.title: Pressure

choices: Ignore it and wallow in her depression
1451222.content:
“It’s over.”

These are the words uttered when one person in a relationship is tired of said relationship and wishes to move on with their life.

But after a Sylveon heard this from her ex-boyfriend, she became a depressed wreck. She had known this guy for several months and was deeply in love with him as time went on. They had dated for almost two months but as time went on, she became clingier with her boyfriend to the point where he couldn’t take it anymore and dumped her.

For the last few days, she was sitting on her couch watching TV with the blinds closed and the lights turned off so that she could wallow in her depression. She hadn’t bathed in those last few days either, but she was too depressed to care about her hygiene or cleaning up as her living room was laid out with food stuffs, stains and garbage all over her floor and her body was riddled with stains and food that she ate.

As Sylveon ate a piece of dried up meat while waiting for the next show to appear, an advertisement came on.

“Do you like Chocolate? Tired of getting bags of Chocolate that cost 10 dollars but only give you 500 mgs?” The commercial then transitioned to a Machamp in a chocolate factory holding up his product. “Hi Billy Champ here for Choco Paradise. The newest shop in town for people who love chocolate. It has thousands of flavours and brands, such as Dark Chocolate, Milk Chocolate, Milk Chocolate, Gourmet Chocolate , and so much more all at reasonable prices. So stop wasting your money at grocery stores for overpriced Chocolate and come on down to Choco Paradise, and to make this the best deal ever, all shoppers who have a Student Card will get three tonnes of Chocolate absolutely free and it will be delivered to your home, just provide your address. So come on down while supplies last!”

As the commercial ended and the next show began to play, an old craving for Sylveon resurfaced. Three tonnes of Chocolate absolutely free? That’s heaven on earth. I must have it. I don’t care if it makes me fat, I will eat my sorrows away with that chocolate!
1451222.title: Fuck yea!

14512221.content:
After Sylveon got cleaned up, she headed down to the new store and saw that although the store was open, no one was waiting in line.

“Strange.” Sylveon said with a confused look on her face. She then decided to head inside the store and ordered her three tonnes of chocolate.

After returning to her home, Sylveon waited for a couple of hours before the truck with Choco Paradise written on the side arrived at her home. After the Machoke’s brought the chocolate into her home and she signed a waiver, the truck left and Sylveon was alone with the 3 tonnes of block chocolate big enough to touch her 20 foot ceiling.

As her body began to tense up from the sight of so much chocolate, her craving was slowly becoming too hard to resist. She knew that it was wrong to eat all that chocolate but her craving for chocolate was becoming too much for her to avoid. Eventually, she lost the will to resist and ran towards the first ton of block chocolate like a jaguar does with their prey.
